subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Robert Gesink of the Netherlands won the grueling sixth stage of the Tour of Switzerland and claimed the race leader’s jersey, while Lance Armstrong showed he was returning to top form by finishing fifth.
snippet: Robert Gesink of the Netherlands won the grueling sixth stage of the Tour of Switzerland and claimed the race leader’s jersey, while Lance Armstrong showed he was returning to top form by finishing fifth.
